## Description {#details}

This represents the llvm.instrprof.callsite intrinsic.

It is structurally like the increment or step counters, hence the inheritance relationship, albeit somewhat tenuous (it&#39;s not &#39;counting&#39; per se)

Definition at line 1617 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h">IntrinsicInst.h</a>.
